code: @Test public void testSparkGet() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedHeaderReceived("name", "world").     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedHeaderReceived("surname", "universe").     String out = template.requestBody("http://localhost:" + getPort() + "/hello/world?surname=universe", null, String.class).     assertEquals("Bye world", out).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("spark-rest:get:/hello/:name").to("mock:foo").transform().simple("Bye ${header.name}").         }     }. }
